ACR response from NMA

Calculate ACR response probability from ordered probit NMA

acr_prob(A, z2, z3, delta)

Arguments

A

Mean probability that ACR response < 20 from cDMARDS
z2

Mean for ACR 50 cutpoint
z3

Mean for ACR 70 cutpoint
delta

Vector of regression coefficient means (on probit scale) for therapies

  • Arguments
